Author: Microsoft Cloud
Title: The New Industrialists | Kraft Heinz - the role of AI in driving operational efficiency & innovation
Description:
This video features Oliver Ganschar from Kraft Heinz discussing how the company is using digital innovation, including AI and digital twins, to modernize food manufacturing processes, improve real-time problem-solving for frontline workers, and capture expert knowledge to enhance product quality and operational efficiency.
